scripts.build: rm -rf css && sass scss:css -s compressed --no-source-map && tailwindcss -i input.css -o output.css
scripts.snapshot: f(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo "Error: No tag name specified, exiting."; exit 1; fi; npm run build && changeset version --snapshot $1 && changeset publish --no-git-tag --tag; }; f
scripts.remove-snapshot: f(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo "Error: No tag name specified, exiting."; exit 1; fi; npm dist-tag rm ada-ui $1; }; f
